basics.name: Lautaro Colazo
basics.label: Full-Stack developer
basics.summary: Experienced full-stack Software Developer with a strong background in building scalable and efficient web applications. Passionate about technology, continuous learning, and problem-solving, I thrive on developing software solutions that make a meaningful impact. Proficient in modern technologies including Python, Django, React, TypeScript, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, and SvelteKit. With a keen eye for detail, I specialize in crafting robust and maintainable software that exceeds expectations. My experience spans backend development, API optimization, data analysis, and frontend engineering, ensuring seamless integration and high performance. I excel in collaborating with diverse teams to deliver fast, reliable, and impactful solutions.

work.name: FamilySearch
work.summary: I have gained extensive experience working with React, focusing on building and maintaining scalable UI components for a high-traffic genealogy event platform. My work includes developing reusable web components, integrating GraphQL to optimize data fetching, and collaborating with backend services built in Java microservices. I have also ensured that projects are delivered on time, aligning with event deadlines with a high success rate. Through this role, I have improved my skills in frontend performance optimization and maintainable code architecture.

work.name: BYU-Idaho Support Center
work.summary: As a member of the Business Solutions team at the BYU-Idaho Support Center, I actively contribute to the development of digital solutions, system automation, and business intelligence. Our goal is to support the call center in efficiently assisting students to find the necessary help and resources.

work.name: BYU-Idaho Support Center
work.summary: As a member of the Business Solutions team at the BYU-Idaho Support Center, I actively contribute to the development of digital solutions, system automation, and business intelligence. Our goal is to support the call center in efficiently assisting students to find the necessary help and resources.

work.name: Magnify
work.summary: I gained extensive experience with the Django framework, primarily focused on maintaining and improving existing APIs. This involved designing and implementing new endpoints and services using Django REST framework and conducting thorough testing of API functionality using tools like Postman. Additionally, I utilized SQL queries to analyze data stored in a PostgreSQL database. A significant aspect of my work involved optimizing code and Django ORM queries to enhance performance, resulting in notable improvements in loading times, with enhancements of up to 64%.
